  • Constructor Details

    • AbstractCRLIssuer

      public AbstractCRLIssuer(se.swedenconnect.security.credential.PkiCredential issuerCredential, String algorithm, CRLRevocationDataProvider crlRevocationDataProvider) throws NoSuchAlgorithmException
      Constructor of the CRL issuer.
      Parameters:
      issuerCredential - credentials of the certificate issuer
      algorithm - algorithm used to sign CRL
      crlRevocationDataProvider - provider of CRL revocation data regarding the state of revoked certificates
      Throws:
      NoSuchAlgorithmException - if the algorithm is not supported

  • Method Details

    • getAki

      protected org.bouncycastle.asn1.x509.AuthorityKeyIdentifier getAki() throws CertificateEncodingException, IOException
      Creates a complete Authority key identifier which includes the name of the issuer, the issuer certificate serial number and the issuer SKI value.
      Returns:
      Authority key identifier
      Throws:
      CertificateEncodingException - problems parsing the issuer certificate
      IOException - problems parsing the issuer certificate

    • getContentSigner

      protected org.bouncycastle.operator.ContentSigner getContentSigner() throws org.bouncycastle.operator.OperatorCreationException
      Get a content signer.
      Returns:
      content signer
      Throws:
      org.bouncycastle.operator.OperatorCreationException - error creating the content signer
